## Meeting.default.updateLLMConnection() method

Connects to low latency mercury and reconnects if the address has changed It will also disconnect if called when the meeting has ended

**Signature:**

```typescript
updateLLMConnection(): Promise<any>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;any&gt;
